title: Saad Amer Mobilizes Voters With Celebrities and Instagram Filters
description: Saad Amer is a telegenic climate activist and founder of Plus1Vote.
dc:creator: Whitney Bauck
media:credit: Sophia Wilson for The New York Times
media:description: Saad Amer spearheaded a voter mobilization campaign with V Magazine that features Scarlett Johansson, Channing Tatum and Iman.
